Articles.Content:
The Green Space Program

my playthrough of KSP in sandbox with these mods:

EVE - for clouds

texture replacer - nicer looking kerbin and no helmets

KER - info only

GreenTweakedParts - my own rescaled jets and nuclear engines

Chatterer - speaking Kerbals

Distant Object Enhancement - realistic sky box brightness

Enhanced NavBall

Improved Chase Camera - for planes

soundtrack editor

aviationlights - for planes

My Personal Flag

Edited July 12, 2014 by Commander Jebidiah

The Kerbo 1

Jeb, Bill and Bob were Standing on the top of Mission Control

Jeb - Bob whats this satellite thing going to do?, will it explode?

Bob - Jeb this satellite wont explode its supposed to gather scientific data from space.

Jeb - Boring!

Loudspeaker - T-10, 9 , 8 , 7, ignition sequence start, 4, 3

2, 1 ,Lift-off of the Kerbo-1 on its way to gather data from space.

Jeb, Bill - Wow!!

Bob - Told you it wouldn't explode

Loudspeaker - T+1:10 begining Gravity turn

Bill - eh... Whats ah gravity turn?

Bob - You didn't listen at training did you?

Bill - Nope

Bob - Well that would explain why I've been picked to be the first Kerbal in orbit

Loudspeaker - T+2:20 Main Engine cutoff Kerbo-1 coasting to orbit insertion burn

Jeb - Thats not fair how come you get to be the first in orbit Bob?

Bob - Becuase im the only one who listened in training.

Loudspeaker - T+4:15 Kerbo-1 is now in orbit.

Jeb and Bill storm off angry that Bob is getting to be the first kerbal in orbit.

Kerbo-1 in orbit 70x85km
